blocks.name: inductionexd
blocks.content: Simple induction example. (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 9-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm inductionexd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, c0), caddc, nat5)))
} = {
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c0, wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, c0), caddc, nat5)), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5)), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5)), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5)), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5)))
  breq2d(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5), co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq1d(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5, co(nat4, cexp, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), nat1, nat4, cexp)
  breq2d(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5), co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1d(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5, co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), nat4, cexp)
  breq2d(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5), co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1d(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5, co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), nat4, cexp)
  breq2d(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5), co(co(nat4, cexp, c0), caddc, nat5), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5, co(nat4, cexp, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, nat4, cexp)
  mp2an(wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5)), w3a(wcel(nat3, cz), wcel(nat3, cz), wcel(co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5), cz)), wceq(co(nat3, cmul, nat3), co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(nat3, cz), wcel(nat3, cz), wcel(co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5), cz))
  mp2an(wcel(co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5), cz), wcel(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), cz), wcel(nat5, cz))
  mp2an(wcel(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), cz), wcel(nat4, cz), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  zexpcl(nat4, nat1)
  zaddcl(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), nat5)
  eqtr4i(co(nat3, cmul, nat3), co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5), nat9)
  3t3e9()
  eqtri(co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5), nat9, co(nat4, caddc, nat5))
  oveq1i(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5, nat4)
  numexp1(nat4)
  4nn0()
  addcomli(nat4, nat5, nat9)
  5p4e9()
  dvds0lem(nat3, nat3, co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5)), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5)))
  breqtrrd(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5), co(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), cmul, nat4), cmin, co(nat3, cmul, nat5)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))))
  dvds2subd(nat3, co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), cmul, nat4), co(nat3, cmul, nat5), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))))
  dvdsmultr1d(nat3, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), nat4, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(nat3, cmul, nat5)))
  mp2an(wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(nat3, cmul, nat5)), wcel(nat3, cz), wcel(nat5, cz))
  dvdsmul1(nat3, nat5)
  zmulcld(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), nat4, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))))
  zaddcld(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), nat5, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5)), wcel(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), cz))
  nnzd(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))), wcel(nat4, cz))
  4z()
  zmulcld(nat3, nat5, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))), wcel(nat3, cz))
  3z()
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5))), wcel(nat5, cz))
  nnzi(nat5)
  5nn()
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5)), wceq(co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5), co(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), cmul, nat4), cmin, co(nat3, cmul, nat5))))
  3eqtr4rd(co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5), co(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), cmul, nat4), cmin, co(nat3, cmul, nat5)), co(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), cmul, nat4), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5)), co(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat4), caddc, co(nat5, cmul, nat4)), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5)), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  oveq1d(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), cmul, nat4), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5), co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat4), caddc, co(nat5, cmul, nat4)), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  adddird(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), nat5, nat4, wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  oveq2d(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5), cmul, nat4), cmin, co(nat3, cmul, nat5), cdc(nat1, nat5), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(co(nat3, cmul, nat5), cdc(nat1, nat5)))
  mulcomli(nat3, nat5, cdc(nat1, nat5))
  eqtr4d(co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5), co(co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat4), caddc, co(nat5, cmul, nat4)), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5)), co(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat4), caddc, co(co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5))), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  oveq12d(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat4), co(co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5)), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  expp1d(nat4, cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(nat5, co(co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5))))
  eqtr4i(nat5, co(co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5)), co(co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cmin, co(nat5, cmul, nat3)))
  3eqtr3ri(nat5, co(co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cmin, co(nat5, cmul, nat3)), co(nat5, cmul, co(nat4, cmin, nat3)), co(nat5, cmul, nat1))
  oveq2i(nat5, cmul, co(nat4, cmin, nat3), nat1)
  eqtri(co(nat4, cmin, nat3), nat1, co(co(nat1, caddc, nat3), cmin, nat3))
  oveq1i(nat4, cmin, nat3, co(nat1, caddc, nat3))
  eqcomi(nat4, co(nat1, caddc, nat3))
  addcomli(nat1, nat3, nat4)
  3p1e4()
  pncan3oi(nat1, nat3)
  ax-1cn()
  subdii(nat5, nat4, nat3)
  3cn()
  mulid1i(nat5)
  oveq2i(co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cmin, cdc(nat1, nat5), co(nat5, cmul, nat3))
  eqcomi(cdc(nat1, nat5), co(nat5, cmul, nat3))
  5t3e15()
  addsubassd(co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat4), co(nat5, cmul, nat4), cdc(nat1, nat5), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  mulcld(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), nat4, wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  nncnd(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  nnexpcld(nat4, cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(nat4, cn))
  4nn()
  nnnn0(cv(hs1))
  mulcld(nat5, nat4, wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(nat5, cc))
  5cn()
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(nat4, cc))
  4cn()
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat5), cc))
  nn0cni(cdc(nat1, nat5))
  deccl(nat1, nat5)
  1nn0()
  5nn0()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, c0), caddc, nat5)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, nat1), caddc, nat5)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat5)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat5)))
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(nat3, cdvds, co(co(nat4, cexp, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat5)))
}
